mapper.select: SELECT * FROM events ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO events (title, content, image_url, link_url, start_date, end_date, status, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{imageUrl}, #{linkUrl}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE events SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, image_url = #{imageUrl}, link_url = #{linkUrl}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate}, status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE event_id = #{eventId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM team_contents ORDER BY sort_order ASC, created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO team_contents (team_code, title, content_url, sort_order, status, created_at) VALUES (#{teamCode}, #{title}, #{contentUrl}, #{sortOrder}, #{status}, NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE team_contents SET team_code = #{teamCode}, title = #{title}, content_url = #{contentUrl}, sort_order = #{sortOrder}, status = #{status} WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
